publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7877 Kenny MacAskill: The Advice and Assistance (Assistance by Way of Representation) (Scotland) Amendment (No. 2) Regulations 2011—That the Justice Committee recommends that the Advice and Assistance (Assistance by Way of Representation) (Scotland) Amendment (No. 2) Regulations 2011 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing*
